title: A neural network approach to predict opioid misuse among previously hospitalized patients using electronic health records
details: L Vega, W Conneen, MA Veronin, RP Schumaker - PLOS ONE, 2024
abstract: Can Electronic Health Records (EHR) predict opioid misuse in general patient populations? This research trained three backpropagation neural networks to explore EHR predictors using existing patient data. Model 1 used patient diagnosis …
